Created page with "{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireFlamer'''
(''no parameter'')
Fires a {{Class|FlameMissile}} with an initial upward velocity of 5 and spread of +-5.6 degrees...."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireFlamer'''
(''no parameter'')
Fires a {{Class|FlameMissile}} with an initial upward velocity of 5 and spread of +-5.6 degrees. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FlameThrower}} and derived classes.
